alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 4:32PM CDT until August 15 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 432 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Samson, or 12 miles west of Geneva, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Geneva, Samson, Black, Leonia, Eunola, Barker Store, Lytle, Prosperity, Darlington, Marl, Arrant Settlement, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Sweetgum Head, Royals Crossroads, Geneva Municipal A/P, Vaughanville, Ganer, Smith Crossroads, Izagora and New Hope. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
